name: Hindustan Construction Company Limited
description: Hindustan Construction Company Limited or HCC Limited is a construction company headquartered in Mumbai, India, whose businesses span the sectors of Engineering & Construction, Real Estate, Infrastructure, Urban development & Management.

name: Reliance Infrastructure
description: Reliance Infrastructure Limited, formerly Reliance Energy Limited and Bombay Suburban Electric Supply, is an Indian private sector enterprise involved in power generation, infrastructure, construction and defence.
